android.permission.CALL_PHONE.description: Allows the application to call phone numbers without your intervention. Malicious applications may cause unexpected calls on your phone bill. Note that this does not allow the application to call emergency numbers.

android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.description: Allows an application to read all of the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to send your data to other people.

android.permission.REORDER_TASKS.description: Allows an application to move tasks to the foreground and background. Malicious applications can force themselves to the front without your control.

android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS.description: Allows an application to modify the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to erase or modify your contact data.

android.permission.READ_CALL_LOG.description: Allows an application to read the user's call log.

android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG.description: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's call log data.

android.permission.READ_PROFILE.info: read the user's personal profile data
android.permission.READ_PROFILE.description: Allows an application to read the user's personal profile data.

android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS.description: Allows an application to perform operations like adding and removing accounts and deleting their password.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALL.description: Allows application to process outgoing calls and change the number to be dialled. Malicious applications may monitor, redirect or prevent outgoing calls.

android.permission.NFC.description: Allows an application to communicate with Near-Field Communication (NFC) tags, cards and readers.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.description: Allows application to modify global audio settings, such as volume and routing.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.info: use the authentication credentials of an account
android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.description: Allows an application to request authentication tokens.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS.description: Allows an application to read the sync settings, such as whether sync is enabled for Contacts.

com.android.launcher.permission.INSTALL_.description: Allows an application to install a shortcut in Launcher.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.BROADCAST_STICKY.description: Allows an application to send sticky broadcasts, which remain after the broadcast ends. Malicious applications can make the phone slow or unstable by causing it to use too much memory.

android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD.description: Allows an application to disable the key lock and any associated password security. A legitimate example of this is the phone disabling the key lock when receiving an incoming phone call, then re-enabling the key lock when the call is finished.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to connect to and disconnect from Wi-Fi access points and to make changes to configured Wi-Fi networks.

android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to change the state of network connectivity.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.WRITE_APN_SETTINGS.description: Allows an application to modify the APN settings, such as Proxy and Port of any APN.

android.permission.GET_TASKS.description: Allows application to retrieve information about currently and recently running tasks. May allow malicious applications to discover private information about other applications.

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.description: Allows an application to show system-alert windows. Malicious applications can take over the entire screen of the phone.

com.android.browser.permission.READ_HIST.description: Allows the application to read all the URLs that the browser has visited and all of the browser's bookmarks.

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES.description: Allows an application to kill background processes of other applications, even if memory is not low.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

com.google.android.gms.permission.ACTIVI.info: allow application to recognize physical activity
com.google.android.gms.permission.ACTIVI.description: Allows an application to recognize physical activity.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.description: Allows an application to view configuration of the local Bluetooth phone and to make and accept connections with paired devices.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.description: Allows an application to configure the local Bluetooth phone and to discover and pair with remote devices.

android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS.description: Allows the modification of collected component usage statistics. Not for use by common applications.

android.permission.FLASHLIGHT.description: Allows the application to control the flashlight.

com.android.launcher.permission.UNINSTAL.description: Don't use this permission in your app. This permission is no longer supported.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

manifest_analysis.title:
Clear text traffic is Enabled For App
[android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: The app intends to use cleartext network traffic, such as cleartext HTTP, FTP stacks, DownloadManager, and MediaPlayer. The default value for apps that target API level 27 or lower is "true". Apps that target API level 28 or higher default to "false". The key reason for avoiding cleartext traffic is the lack of confidentiality, authenticity, and protections against tampering; a network attacker can eavesdrop on transmitted data and also modify it without being detected.
manifest_analysis.name: Clear text traffic is Enabled For App [android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

playstore_details.title: TextFun : Free Texting & Calling
playstore_details.description:
The free phone application Textfun lets you make unlimited calls and text messages  over Wi-Fi or cellular data.No matter where you are, you can text and call to keep in touch with friends and family around the world! Get a real US or Canadian personal phone number for free with TextFun.  And you can save money and make international long-distance calls, and easily convert your tablet and other devices into mobile phones. Easily get a second number without another SIM card, choose one for work and one for family.

★Let you have a real US or Canadian number for free
★The registration method is simple and fast, protect your privacy
★Calls and messages between users are completely free
★Super-saving international calls, get through to any number in the world
★Enjoy free access to any mobile phone number in the world
★Enjoy the ultra-saving service sent to any mobile phone number in the world
TextFun Key Features
Free Phone Number 
✔TextFun can be your second phone number!
✔No mobile plan required, make calls for free!
✔Domestic and international calls, free Wi-Fi calls allow you to call anyone, even if you don’t have a mobile data plan

Free TextFun Number
✔Provide a new US/Canada phone number
✔Pick a mobile number you like as your second phone number
✔You can use this number to text and call anyone in the world.

Free Texting
✔Receive free SMS messages for any mobile number
✔Save money and send text messages to domestic and foreign countries
✔Funny emojis for you to choose

International Calls
✔Use Wi-Fi to call mobile numbers in nearly 200 countries and territories around the world 
✔without paying expensive roaming charges
✔Fully free international long distance calls using TextFun coins
✔Your local number or anonymous number can be displayed on the other party's phone according to your choice.

Free Call From Your Tablet
✔No mobile plan required, use your Android tablet to call and text to friends and family.
✔Connect to Wi-Fi for free texting and calling
✔Provide a second phone number for your tablet to text and call freely

Credit score
✔Rich and interesting ways to earn call points, such as game turntables, complete fun tasks, cool videos, etc.
✔Use these points for free calls and free text messages

❤Contact Us 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BestTextFun/
Email: plustextfun@gmail.com

Text free & free call, we are constantly working hard on making the “TextFun” more perfect for your needs. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or just say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of ‘TextFun, do rate us ★★★★★ on play store. Tell your friends if you are enjoying  TextFun.

Thanks for your support
Your TextFun
playstore_details.summary: Best texting app & calling app via free phone number.
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Best texting app & calling app via free phone number.
